Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
July 2023 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

Welcome to the latest edition of The Justia Insider! As we enter the second half of 2023, we are proud of our team's achievements and milestones. Let's stay dedicated to delivering value and executing tasks effectively. Your suggestions for improvement are welcome as we strive to enhance our work and provide excellent service to our clients. Please feel free to share any comments or questions, as we value open communication and continuous employee development.

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Justia Connect. We launched On-Demand Continuing Legal Education (CLEs) for all Justia Connect Pro members.

Payments. We’ve automated handling payment disputes and the Justia Connect Pro Credits application to streamline internal processes related to Justia Lawyer Directory fees. Additionally, we now send automatic emails to Justia Lawyer Directory clients to best communicate the following steps to reduce subscription churn due to payment failures.

Justia Elevate. We added the Full-Text Search to our client's websites and new versions for Header, Footer, and Contact Form Stripes to display the Search form to improve our Justia Elevate platform. We also added new versions for the Quarter goals for the Basic Stripe with credit card payment options and a different look and feel for the Client Reviews Stripe.

Justia U.S. Supreme Court Portal. We improved the user interaction while checking supreme case listing pages. We also added Former Justices' biographies and their written opinions. Likewise, the frontend team improved the portal performance by creating standalone static assets split from other Justia properties, and we continued with our ongoing efforts for editorial updates.

Content Transfer. We transferred all the content from our Justia Mexico site to an upgraded system enabling faster updates. Additionally, we simplified the process of adding new entries to our Law Schools portal.

SEC Contracts. We improved the grouping and presentation of contract clauses. We've also implemented backend improvements to categorize our content better.

20-Anniversary Branding. As we celebrate our 20th anniversary, we are rolling out special branding across our properties. You will notice the banner on our websites, email reports, and other branded resources.

QA Automation. We have improved the performance and usability of our Visual Regression QA Reports. Similarly, we implemented better support for our Justia Elevate and Justia Ask A Lawyer properties, which include performance analysis.

IT Team. This month, we completed several IT maintenances covering various properties, including Justia Law, the Justia Lawyer Directory, Justia Patents, and Justia Blogs. Our IT team continues to ensure our sites' stability and optimal functioning.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • New Disability Law Center Added. We released our 52nd Center on Disability Law, covering benefits available to people with disabilities and their rights in employment, housing, and other vital areas.
  • Justia Legal Dictionary. We completed the AI prompts for generating and checking the definitions in the Justia Legal Dictionary.
  • 50-State Surveys Expanded. We wrote civil and criminal statutes of limitations, and dram shop laws surveys, which will be added to our Lawyers & The Legal Process, Criminal Law, and Car Accidents centers, respectively.
  • Commercial Real Estate Content. We continued to write pages for the Small Business Center on legal concerns for businesses buying, selling, or leasing property.
  • Justia Mexico Portal. Our team updated and included new pages for the Labor Law Center on the Justia Mexico Portal. We covered relevant information for employees, employers, and lawyers, including laws and jurisprudence regarding employee profit sharing, dismissal, wrongful dismissal, resignation, paid vacation, and more. Magazines and media press articles have cited some of this content.

NEW TEAM MEMBERS

Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

Gerardo Subealdea

Help Desk - Intern

I'm Luis Gerardo Subealdea Hernandez, a 21-year-old student pursuing computer systems engineering at the Technical Institute of Saltillo. Gaming has been my thing since I was five, so you can imagine how much I love all sorts of video games and how much I love spending my free time playing them. I'm super passionate about programming. Exploring new technologies and coding my projects is an absolute blast and it keeps me hooked.

JUSTIA PET NEWS

Nini

Nini (Basset Hound) turned nine years old. We are happy because she has been brave as she 100% recovered from her lipoma surgery. She loves car rides while feeling the fresh air and whispering her barks.

- Claudia Duque

UPCOMING HOLIDAYS

Dates to Remember
USA Independence Day
July 4th

Independence Day, commonly referred to as the Fourth of July, is a yearly festivity that honors the establishment of the US nationhood through the adoption of the Declaration of Independence on July 4th, 1776, by the Continental Congress. Embrace the spirit of this national holiday and have a joyful Fourth of July!

Did You Know?

Jose Ramos Was Honored With the Professional Merit Award

Jose Ramos Mateos received the Professional Merit Award from the University of Ixtlahuaca CUI. This accolade recognizes Jose's trajectory and efforts in fostering the Mazahua language and culture through education, literature, and radio broadcasting in Mexico and other countries. Jose also talked about his professional work at Justia, including the organization's mission, free legal resources, and the Justia Mexico Portal.

TEAM ACTIVITY

Escape Room

Yes! We had another exciting edition of the Escape Room. As some of you may already know, the primary objective of this thrilling event was to successfully escape from each room or uncover hidden treasures within the shortest time frame possible. We wholeheartedly appreciate your enthusiastic involvement and unwavering dedication to securing victory. With great anticipation, we eagerly await your presence in the upcoming edition!

REVIEWS & RECOMMENDATIONS

Tomorrow and Tomorrow and Tomorrow by Gabrielle Zevin

Available on Amazon

"A perfect story full of leadership, decision-making, creativity, and nostalgic video game references. When Sam and Sadie meet again after six years of not seeing each other, Sadie gives Sam a diskette with her new video game, Solution. After Sam’s played through, he decides that they need to keep in touch with his old friend and develop new video games together."

- Alejandra Medina

Collaborators: Alejandra Medina, Alejandro Moreno, Arturo Jara, Erika Azuela, Genaro Osoria, Haydee Garcia, Jorge Contreras, Jose Ramos, Lauren Moskie, Miguel Berlanga, Omar Carreon, Rene Peralta, and Zoraida Vallejo.
